name: Victini Prism Star
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being’s entire body will be overflowing with power.

attacks.name: Infinity
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each basic Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
